PAT1020. Tree Traversals (25)

PAT1016. Phone Bills (25)

2014年09月04日

模拟

题意

求每个人的账单

细节

  • 时间字符串直接排序
  • 取模输出时必须注意前导零

代码

#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
struct P{
    string name,time;
    int type;
}p[1010];
bool cmp(P a,P b){
    if(a.name!=b.name) return a.name<b.name;
    return a.time<b.time;
}
int r[24];
int temp[2],last[2];

void gao(string time,int t){
    int d,h,m;
    d=(time[3]-'0')*10+time[4]-'0';
    h=(time[6]-'0')*10+time[7]-'0';
    m=(time[9]-'0')*10+time[10]-'0';
    int ans=0,i;
    if(h<24) ans=m*r[h];
    for(i=0;i<=23;++i) ans+=60*(d-1)*r[i];
    for(i=0;i<=h-1;++i) ans+=60*r[i];
    temp[t]=ans;
    last[t]=60*24*(d-1)+60*h+m;
}
string s,name;
int main(){
    freopen("d.in","r",stdin);
    int ans,n,i,ok,m,t,l;
    for(i=0;i<24;++i) cin>>r[i];
    cin>>n;
    for(i=0;i<n;++i){
        cin>>p[i].name>>p[i].time>>s;
        if(s[1]=='n') p[i].type=1;
        else p[i].type=0;
    }
    sort(p,p+n,cmp);
    //for(i=0;i<n;++i) cout<<p[i].name<<" "<<p[i].time<<" "<<p[i].type<<endl;
    ok=0;
    ans=0;
    name=p[0].name;
    m=(p[0].time[0]-'0')*10+p[0].time[1]-'0';
    for(i=1;i<n;++i){
        if(p[i].name!=name){
            if(ok){
                cout<<"Total amount: $"<<ans/100<<".";
                ans=ans%100;
                if(ans<10) cout<<"0";
                cout<<ans%100<<endl;
            }
            ok=0;
            ans=0;
            name=p[i].name;
        }else{
            if(!p[i].type && p[i-1].type){
                if(!ok){
                    ok=1;
                    cout<<name<<" "<<m/10<<m%10<<endl;
                }
                gao(p[i].time,0);
                gao(p[i-1].time,1);
                t=temp[0]-temp[1];
                l=last[0]-last[1];
                ans+=t;
                cout<<p[i-1].time.substr(3)<<" "<<p[i].time.substr(3)<<" "<<l<<" $"<<t/100<<".";
                t=t%100;
                if(t<10) cout<<"0";
                cout<<t%100<<endl;
            }
        }
    }
    if(ok){
        cout<<"Total amount: $"<<ans/100<<".";
        ans=ans%100;
        if(ans<10) cout<<"0";
        cout<<ans%100<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
